text: Kwavija Usenga Unogile wogubula vija Mulungu viyowatenda wanhu kuwa bule uzenzeleganye kubitila nhamanila songela haichanduso mbaka hakimambukizo, kamba viyandikigwe Mzinyandiko Zing'alile, “Munhu ayo yalibule uzenzeleganye kokala muinhamanila.”1:17 Mbuli zino zolawa mkitabu cha HABAKUKI 2:4.
